name: The Journey to Become
description:
"A Star will perform their duties until the day they are... Reborn.  And you, My Little Wonder, are at the end of your light. You have spent all of your life shining as brightly as you could. And for that, I am proud of you! But it is time to go.
As you are Reborn, you will Sing one last Song, Tell one last Story, and Grant one last Wish."

The Journey to Become is a visual novel where you are a Star on their way to being Reborn. Make choices to decide your destination and New Life. Answer questions to help understand yourself better. And most importantly, enjoy the Journey.

As you progress, your choices will affect not only where and what you are Reborn as, but the music as well! Start with ambient blue and brown noise. Add instruments and listen to the melody grow and change.

  • over 7,000 words of content
  • 24 different endings
  • 8 songs for you to create

Content Warning: This game is thought-provoking and talks about death, among other topics. Proceed with healthy boundaries and make sure to check in with yourself.

"If the search for perfection was destructive, then it would be better to create and be messy."
This is my first ever visual novel, and I am so excited to have finished it! This game was created for: Bad Art Visual Novel Jam The theme was Transformation.

Story, Art, and Music by: 7Skyes
